name: Enjoy Culture, Architectural & Arts of Borneo Island in Kuching Sarawak
description: If you are looking for a peaceful and medium-slow pace of travelling destination. Kuching Sarawak will be your destination of Heaven. Kuching, is no doubt one of the most preferred city to stay-in in Malaysia. With the great historical heritage and fantastic multi-cultural society, Kuching will be a city in Malaysia you simply can't miss.
